title: The mania over Threads, explained
description: Be honest: Are you rooting for Mark Zuckerberg?

title: How Twitter lost its place as the global town square
description: Twitter is hemorrhaging relevance, Meta's Threads made an impressive debut, but TikTok is the social media app to beat.

title: Tesla owners are using steering-wheel weights to drive hands-free
description: The devices, which aim to stop Tesla Autopilot from nagging drivers to put their hands on the wheel, have been criticized by regulators and safety experts.

title: ChatGPT loses users for first time, shaking faith in AI revolution
description: OpenAI's chatbot has been heralded as spurring a revolution in the tech world. But its spectacular growth has suddenly slowed down.

title: Download. Scroll. Post. Repeat. New social media apps are exhausting us.
description: As millions flock to Threads, many social media users are exhausted by the onslaught of new apps, some of which look more like imitators than innovators.

title: ‘Vague’ injunction on social media must be stayed, Justice Dept. says
description: The Biden administration asked a federal judge to stay his sweeping July 4 injunction barring many government interactions with social media companies.
